unnormalised: AI is developing fast! GPT-4 has 1.76 trillion parameters, but future models might have 10x that, needing specialized hardware like Google's TPUs to run efficiently & costing $100M+ to train.
normalised: A-I is developing fast! G-P-T-four has one point seven six trillion parameters, but future models might have ten times that, needing specialized hardware like Google's T-P-Us to run efficiently and costing dollar one hundred million plus to train.
